title: What the heck is a handlebar?
text: Not that I know much myself yet, but so far I think it's just a way to dynamically produce HTML content and inject data from your database into it.

title: Race-day Prep
text: The day before the races, drink plenty of water and get some rest.  Your team will thank you for it!  Make sure you have your paddle, life-jacket, chair, snacks, weather-gear, and something to do between heats.

title: 2021 race season likely cancelled
text: With a lot of festivals cancelled due to the pandemic, now is a great time to brush-up on your javascript array methods!
